ghostPost.title: Lynx Roundup, January 17th
ghostPost.excerpt: When to built a distributed system!  A cool package to validate Pandas dataframes!  Mike Bostock (the D3 guy) introduces the Comma Separated Tree!

authors.name: Matthew Alhonte
authors.bio: Super villain in somebody's action hero movie. Experienced a radioactive freak accident at a young age, which rendered him part-snake and strangely adept at Python.
